featured.text: The next day she met another traveler who was hungry.
When the hungry traveler saw the precious stone, he asked her to give it to him.
When they are hungry, some female fireflies lure the males of other species to them.
And thousands more were left homeless, hungry, and grieving.

definition.en_def: Feeling a need or desire for food.
definition.example: I am so hungry that I could eat a whole pizza.
